title: Login issue
description: User cannot log in with correct credentials.

title: Payment failure
description: Credit card payment not going through.

title: UI bug on dashboard
description: Dashboard widgets overlap on smaller screens.

title: Email notifications not received
description: Customer not getting order confirmation emails.

title: Slow website performance
description: Pages take too long to load during peak hours.

title: Broken link in footer
description: Support link in footer leads to 404 page.

title: Mobile app crash
description: App crashes when opening settings on Android.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: Customer requests a dark mode option.

title: Incorrect order total
description: Cart total does not include discounts properly.

title: Missing product images
description: Some items show broken image icons.

title: Refund not processed
description: Refund request still pending after 10 days.

title: Account locked
description: Customer locked out after multiple failed logins.

title: Search not working
description: Search returns no results even for existing products.

title: Profile picture upload issue
description: Uploading profile photo fails with error 500.
